title: Feedly Notifier Plus
name: ifnplus
description: is a smart badged powered toolbar notifier for feedly.com, a productive way to organize, read and share the content of your favorite feeds, blogs and news sites.
author: Jeremy Schomery

preferences.title: Display badge notification
preferences.description: Check this option if you would like to have badge notification on toolbar button. It may take a few seconds for the badge to appear.
preferences.name: badge

preferences.title: Show FAQs page on upgrades:
preferences.description: If this option is checked, the extension displays welcome page after each upgrade to notify you about the recent changes.
preferences.name: show
